flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
They crush berries with their talons. They bravely
stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong
it is.
flavor_text_entries.black:
They crush berries with their talons.
They bravely stand up to any opponent,
no matter how strong it is.
flavor_text_entries.white:
They will challenge anything, even strong
opponents, without fear. Their frequent
fights help them become stronger.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It stands up to massive opponents, not
out of courage, but out of recklessness.
But that is how it gets stronger.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
It stands up to massive opponents, not
out of courage, but out of recklessness.
But that is how it gets stronger.
flavor_text_entries.x:
They crush berries with their talons. They bravely
stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong
it is.
flavor_text_entries.y:
They will challenge anything, even strong
opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help
them become stronger.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
They will challenge anything, even strong
opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help
them become stronger.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
They pick fights indiscriminately. They grow
stronger and more powerful each time they
faint or are injured.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its
prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also
consumes berries, it’s a carnivore at heart.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
With its powerful legs and sturdy claws, it can
crack even the hard shells of Shellder and pluck
out their insides.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Known as a natural-born warrior, soon after its
hatching, it will challenge its parent to a fight in
order to gain their acceptance.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
If it spies a strong Pokémon, Rufflet can’t resist
challenging it to a battle. But if Rufflet loses,
it starts bawling.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
A combative Pokémon, it’s ready to pick a fight
with anyone. It has talons that can crush
hard berries.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
Its chick-like looks belie its hotheadedness. It challenges its
parents at every opportunity, desperate to prove its strength.
